item.title: I need a good compiler that will work with Jdk 6 update 13
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

[quote=“King Lingerz, post:9, topic:270670”][quote author=Raams link=topic=357191.msg2730203#msg2730203 date=1238650623]
Lol if you can’t edit a simple batch code then why bother being in these forums? How can you code a server if you can’t even code a compiler lol. Like im sure theres other ways of getting this, next time search for it before you post a thread. Like what they say in the rules or w/e, USE GOOGLE.
[/quote]

Were you born with the knowledge of compiling? I didn’t know at first either…[/quote]

Mhmm - I learnt most of my stuff from Mopar AND Java Tuts…
When I first started I barely knew how a compiler worked (code wise(how to write one)), but you pick it up as easy as hell; and if you don’t, well…You’ve got a very difficult time ahead…

Read full topic

item.source: I need a good compiler that will work with Jdk 6 update 13

item.title: I need a good compiler that will work with Jdk 6 update 13
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

Yea that’s kinda why these “help” areas are here…

But you should still look up a few Tuts in the tutorial section first…

Btw you sure you have JDK 6 Update 13?
Because if you do that compiler should have worked. (Unless you installed Java in a different directory)
If you have installed in Java in a different Path, Replace C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe* with the Path that Java is located on your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: I need a good compiler that will work with Jdk 6 update 13
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Mopar1 Mr Mopar
item.description:
@Mr_Mopar1 wrote:

@echo off COLOR 07 title My Compiler echo Compiling My Files "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause cls COLOR 02 echo echo Files Compiled echo
Use that >.>

Read full topic

item.source: I need a good compiler that will work with Jdk 6 update 13

item.title: I need a good compiler that will work with Jdk 6 update 13
item.dc:creator: @Arc_Angel Arc Angel
item.description:
@Arc_Angel wrote:

This is just a very basic compiler that should work…
Cut & Paste this into you compiler

@echo off
COLOR 07
title My Compiler
echo Compiling My Files
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
cls
COLOR 02
echo
echo Files Compiled
echo

Replace this C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_13\bin\javac.exe with your Java File Path.

Read full topic
